short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn Blog posts into podcasts and listen to them on your phone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can save blogposts, which you can listen to with our app later on. We also generate a unique RSS feed for every user, so you can listen to your converted blogposts on any podcast app.
